id: A Very Very Very Dark Matter, Bridge Theatre, review: a very very dark view of Hans Christian Andersen
paragraph:
Was Hans Christian Andersen a witless, racist, sweary no-talent whose enchanting fairy-tale output was actually produced by a one-legged Congolese pygmy woman long confined in a mahogany cabinet in his Copenhagen attic?The preposterous scenario of A Very Very Very Dark Matter, the latest play by veteran troublemaker Martin McDonagh, is nigh-on calculated to provoke howls of outrage.
